greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sum_{k >= 0} bin2(wt(n+k),k+1), where bin2(i,j) = A013609(i,j), wt(i) = A000120(i).
link: David Applegate, Omar E. Pol and N. J. A. Sloane, The Toothpick Sequence and Other Sequences from Cellular Automata, Congressus Numerantium, Vol. 206 (2010), 157-191. [There is a typo in Theorem 6: (13) should read u(n) = 4.3^(wt(n-1)-1) for n >= 2.]
N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
maple: bin2:=proc(n,k) option remember; if k<0 or k>n then 0
elif k=0 then 1 else 2*bin2(n-1,k-1)+bin2(n-1,k); fi; end;
w := 0; m := n; while m > 0 do i := m mod 2; w := w+i; m := (m-i)/2; od; w; end:
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 01 2009
